name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 鏡花ちゃん
summary:
秘密部隊のパイロットの鏡花ちゃん。 
最新鋭シュミレータのＡＩとの
リンクテストを行う事になったのだが・・・
--
Sweet KYOKA is a top-secret experimental pilot.
She’s put in charge of link tests for a next-gen simulator AI, but things never seem to go as planned…
Sometimes she ends up getting tested, even under her pilot suit!

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
If you miss…
You can also use your pen to make her do as you wish.

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
